typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		components_id as string,
		components_name as string,
		components_isDeprecated as string,
		components_type as string,
		dependencies as (type as string, name as string, version as string)[],
		product_id as string,
		product_name as string,
		{authoritative-branch} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	singleDocument: true) ~> atomsAugmented
source(output(
		{authoritative-branch} as string,
		component_id as string,
		component_isDeprecated as boolean,
		component_name as string,
		component_type as string,
		dependencies as (name as string, type as string, version as string)[],
		product_hasAppFullInstall as boolean,
		product_hasDatabaseFullInstall as boolean,
		product_hasValidatedAppFullInstall as boolean,
		product_hasValidatedDatabaseFullInstall as boolean,
		product_id as string,
		product_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
atomsAugmented sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
